TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You get it, but it makes you so attractive that the mass amount of girls crowding your house causes you to die from suffocation.

I wish for headphones.

Granted! Best headphones on the market. Did I mention that you also lost your hearing?

I wish for a drink.

granted h2o2

i wish for a pair of xboxes

Granted, but they are just boxes with Xs written on them.

I wish it was summer already.

granted, but you are teleported to the north pole and you can't get back.

I wish for a pizza. a delicious pancetta pizza.

Granted. All of a sudden, a live news report shows in the corner. You gaze up in curiosity, and read the headlines: Master thief of pizza on the loose. Guard your delicious special arrangement of triangles on your plate. In the seconds it took you to read the news, it's already too late. He's come and gone. You look down to find not even a crumb left behind. You are shocked, then frightened. When will he strike again?

Because of this unfortunate experience, you decide to give up pizza forever, with the reasoning to not give him the satisfaction...

I wish someone would believe that my 1943 copper penny is real.

Granted. but they steal it!

I wish for a new set of Black buckled boots!

The buckles cut deep into your feet.

After trying to walk, you crumble down and die.

I wish for my Laythe base to have a Aries A3

Granted, but you\'re in the cargo bay, and they neglected to make sure there was sufficient air circulation down there

.

The Orion spacecraft doesn't have a cargo bay.

ERROR WISH NOT FOUND REBOOT

i wish for a normal apple

Granted. Normal apple. Nothing suspicious... Wont hurt at all... Perfectly fine to take a bite...

Yeesh, that was creepy. Well, I guess my wish would be to meet Apollo Robbins, and for someone here to not make the obvious corruption.

Don't know who he is, so I send you to meet the Greek god Apollo instead

I wish I was captain of the Space Battleship Yamato

Granted I kill you

i wish FOR MY STUPID AVATAR TO BE RECONIZED!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Granted. It's recognized to be a mark of a terrorist organization and you are therefore banned.

I wish to become a legend.

You do, and then snipers take you out because they are jealous.

I wish for my Laythe base to have a Aries A3.

google informs me that an Aries A3 is a surround sound system. Therefore your wish is granted, but you forgot to pack any music, peripherals, power cords, power adaptors, cables or anything else so it is completely non-functional.

I wish to be immortalized in history for doing something totally awesome.

granted, you are immortalized for performing a final act of self-sacrifice(resulting in death).

I wish I will do well on my final

Granted. You did so well that everyone has unrealistically high expectations from you now. Have fun.

I wish for a good night's sleep.

Granted you never wake up

i wish I was 15 pounds richer

Granted, you gain 15 pounds... of body-weight.

I wish Dean Martin would come back from the grave.

Granted. He is now a zombie, and eats your brain.

I wish to post the 10000th comment on this thread.

Granted. Nothing happens. Then the world ends.

I wish for a Cat.

Granted, it's a murderous cat and it kills you.

I wish my parents didn't want to move out of our current house.

Granted. Your house wants to move out of your parents now, and leaves.

I wish for more numbers.

Granted, but you have to write out every single one of them without using scientific notation.

I wish for a rusty spoon.
